availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, minister. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Jane Rogers Dickerson in Warren County in January 1840. Father of William H. Dickerson, Thomas R. Dickerson, Archie R. Dickerson, Mary B. Dickerson, Edwin Dickerson, Rose Dickerson, and Florence Dickerson. Clergyman in Warren County in 1850. Owned nine enslaved persons in Warren County in 1850. Minister in Warren County in 1860. Owned twenty-four enslaved persons in Warren County in 1860.
